<DB=SQLITE>
# Question
上海市宝山区同达小学的教师总数是多少

# Schema
{
  "questions": {
    "description": "问题定义表",
    "columns": [
      "id",
      "content",
      "level1_name",
      "level1_description",
      "level2_name",
      "level2_description"
    ],
    "primary_keys": [
      "id"
    ],
    "foreign_keys": []
  },
  "schools": {
    "description": "学校基本信息表",
    "columns": [
      "id",
      "email",
      "phone",
      "province",
      "city",
      "district",
      "school_name",
      "year",
      "school_type",
      "school_area_type",
      "class_num",
      "teacher_num",
      "student_num",
      "data_mark"
    ],
    "primary_keys": [
      "id"
    ],
    "foreign_keys": []
  },
  "school_answers": {
    "description": "学校答案数据表",
    "columns": [
      "id",
      "school_id",
      "question_id",
      "value"
    ],
    "primary_keys": [
      "id"
    ],
    "foreign_keys": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "seq": 0,
        "table": "schools",
        "from": "school_id",
        "to": "id",
        "on_update": "CASCADE",
        "on_delete": "CASCADE",
        "match": "NONE"
      },
      {
        "id": 1,
        "seq": 0,
        "table": "questions",
        "from": "question_id",
        "to": "id",
        "on_update": "CASCADE",
        "on_delete": "CASCADE",
        "match": "NONE"
      }
    ]
  }
}
